forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun dapples the golden hues of the afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the air is filled with that crisp, invigorating quality emblematic of spring. A gentle westward breeze whispers along the streets, while temperatures hover around a pleasant 68 degrees, inviting wanderers to embrace the openness of the day. While the warmth lingers, it will gradually soften to a comfortable 64, perfect for afternoon strolls or quiet moments in the park. This balmy reprieve is punctuated by the promise of a partly cloudy night, encouraging a relaxed atmosphere under a wealth of stars awaiting their debut.

The scene is unencumbered by the usual fog, which has yet to blanket the city this afternoon. Instead, expansive views stretch across the Bay, showcasing the majestic contours of the Golden Gate and the silhouette of the city rising against a backdrop of cerulean sky. With the evening creeping closer, layers might be wise as you prepare for nighttime, where temperatures will dip to a snug 51. Perhaps a light jacket will suffice, perfect for sipping warm beverages at a sidewalk café or enjoying a leisurely walk along the waterfront. This is an evening set for quiet appreciation—a chance to bask in the sweet serenity that only San Francisco can offer, as the city slowly shifts from day to night in a graceful transition.
